item.title: Retinar Wins Transformar Salud 2023
item.description: We are thrilled to announce that Retinar has been named the winner of the 2023 Transformar Salud edition, organized by Fundación Garrahan and Laboratorios Roche Argentina.

item.title: Visit from the Minister of Health of the Nation
item.description: We conducted a demonstration of our platform and discussed potential avenues to scale our project and utilize it at a national level with Carla Vizzotti, Minister of Health of the Nation.

item.title: Retinar Receives the 2021 Annual Award from the National Academy of Medicine
item.description: Yesterday afternoon, we had the honor of receiving the 2021 Award from the National Academy of Medicine of Buenos Aires for our work on @retinarARG alongside @Tomass_Castilla, Alejandro Koch, Marcela Martínez, and Mercedes Leguía from @ElCruceHospital and Ignacio Larrabide.

item.title: Award for Best Oral Presentation at CNO 2022
item.description: We are thrilled to announce that Retinar has been honored with the award for the best scientific work presented at the 2022 National Congress of Ophthalmology (CNO).

item.title: Retinar Presented at the JIS of the Italian Hospital
item.description: We had the privilege of presenting Retinar at the Informatics and Health Conference of the Italian Hospital.

item.title: Retinar Receives Funding from PAC Emprendedores para la Innovación
item.description: We are thrilled to announce that Retinar has secured funding from the Ministry of Productive Development of Argentina as part of the PAC Emprendedores para la Innovación initiative.

item.title: Retinar Secures Funding from Agencia I+D+i (Argentina)
item.description: We are delighted to announce that Retinar has been awarded funding through the 2021 call for PICT startups from the Agencia Nacional para la Promoción de la Investigación, el Desarrollo Científico y la Innovación (Agencia I+D+i).

item.title: Retinar Recognized by NVIDIA Corporation
item.description: Retinar is thrilled to announce that we have been selected as a member of the prestigious NVIDIA Applied Research Accelerator Program.

item.title: Retinar Secures PICT 2019 Funding from Agencia I+D+i
item.description: Retinar is thrilled to announce that our project, titled “Characterization of Optic Nerve Head Morphology from Color Fundus Pictures Using Deep Learning” (CANOA: Caracterización Morfológica de la Cabeza del Nervio Óptico en Fotografías de Fondo de Ojo Mediante Aprendizaje Profundo), has been awarded a PICT 2019 grant by Agencia I+D+i, the national agency for funding research.

item.title: Retinar Featured on Ciencia por Cientificxs
item.description: On October 5th of this year, I had the privilege of participating in the first episode of the new season of Ciencia por Cientificxs, the science outreach program on AbraTV, the UNICEN TV channel.

item.title: Retinar Showcased on WOW Innovation
item.description: On February 5th of this year, Retinar had the honor of being featured on the WOW Innovation segment aired on Channel 8 of Mar del Plata.

item.title: Retinar is the most voted initiative at Prendete 2020
item.description: We are thrilled to announce that Retinar has won the popular vote at Prendete 2020, the startup contest organized in Tandil to increase the visibility of innovative initiatives.

item.title: Retinar receives a UNICEN's JOVIN Grant for R&D
item.description: Retinar is proud to announce that our project, titled “Towards an Intelligent Platform for Remote Diabetic Retinopathy Screening: Quality Control in Fundus Photography Using Autoencoders,” has been awarded a JOVIN grant of AR$ 100,000 (approximately U$D 1000) by UNICEN.

item.title: Retinar receives a UNICEN's JOVIN Grant for R&D
item.description: Retinar is proud to announce that our project, titled “Towards an Intelligent Platform for Remote Diabetic Retinopathy Screening: Quality Control in Fundus Photography Using Autoencoders,” has been awarded a JOVIN grant of AR$ 100,000 (approximately U$D 1000) by UNICEN.

item.title: Retinar joins Prendete 2020
item.description: We are thrilled to announce our participation in the 2020 edition of Prendete, an innovative business ideas contest.

item.title: Our new website is live!
item.description: We are delighted to announce the launch of our new website. This platform is designed to keep you informed about all our latest developments and news in real time.
